title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Interactive Korean Language Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Korean grammar and vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize 200 core Korean vocabulary items required in daily work situations
Through situational conversation simulations (meetings, phone calls, emails), learners can use intermediate-level spoken expressions
Using a real-time pronunciation evaluation system provided through a mobile app, learners can pronounce with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
